name: Matomo
description: Matomo is the leading open alternative to Google Analytics that gives you full control over your data. Matomo lets you easily collect data from websites, apps & the IoT and visualise this data and extract insights. Privacy is built-in.

MATOMO_INIT_SITE_NAME.description: name of the initial site sending analytics

MATOMO_INIT_SITE_URL.description: URL of the initial site sending analytics

MAIL_URL.description: URL to the mailserver which is going to send Matomo emails

MATOMO_PLUGINS_API_LICENSE_KEY.description: Matomo API key used for fetching purchased plugins
